revised_title: The Eclipse Foretold by Thales: A Historical Inquiry
tldr: The author, George Costard, investigates the year of the eclipse foretold by Thales and discusses various historical accounts and calculations related to the event. He examines the works of other scholars, such as Theon, Cleomedes, and Isaac Newton, and concludes that the eclipse occurred in the year before Christ 603, supporting the account given by Herodotus.
